The book is basically collected short stories on some selected gods (roman, celtic, japanese) 

Some parts are interesting, some are unnecessary and unrelatable to the vietnamese audience, in my opinion.

Writing style is gen z friendly, maybe too gen z oriented. 


I think  the god story lines could be separaed into continents/areas, and published in different books rather than composed into one single book, and historical viewpoints can be incorporated to help the audience understand why the stories came into place.

Anyway, more rigorous editing and reviewing should be done or maybe it was my expectation that is problematic.
